title: Announcement: Permanent Server Shutdown
body:
We would like to inform all our valued users and artists that the Lyrical Chord application and website have been permanently shut down. Due to ongoing internal challenges, we are no longer able to continue operating or maintaining our services.

We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and deeply appreciate the love, creativity, and support you have shared with us throughout this journey.

We are profoundly thankful to every member, artist, and user who believed in us, contributed to our growth, and helped shape the Lyrical Chord community. Your trust and engagement meant everything to us.

Although this marks the end of the Lyrical Chord platform, we will always cherish the memories, music, and moments we created together. Thank you for being a meaningful part of our story.
